title: A Corn husk doll by Deanna Skye
creator_credit: Geoff Voyce, National Indian Arts and Crafts and B T Film-Sound
brief_description: Deanna Skye, a Cayuga Indian, is one of the few that still carries on the beautiful craft of making corn husk dolls using materials gathered from nature. Pause for a while with an Indian mother as she makes a corn husk doll for her child.
